BattleEffectText.Name: Solitude
BattleEffectText.Desc: Reduce Speed by 2. Take 1-2 damage at the start of the Scene. (Does not stack)

BattleEffectText.Name: Allure of The Red Shoes
BattleEffectText.Desc: Prioritize attacking targets that used <Glitter>. Deal +2-4 damage.

BattleEffectText.Name: Rainbow Sea
BattleEffectText.Desc: Reduce Speed by 3 for {0} Scene(s). Lose 10% of current HP and restore 1 Light at the start of the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Pale Hands
BattleEffectText.Desc: After the character is hit {0} times, 3-10 bonus Stagger damage is dealt.

BattleEffectText.Name: Ice Splinters
BattleEffectText.Desc: Receiving {0} more Ice Splinters will render the character Immobilized for two Scenes.

BattleEffectText.Name: Teddy’s Love
BattleEffectText.Desc: Upon losing a clash against a target that used <Nostalgic Embrace of the Old Days>, take Stagger damage equal to the dice value at a {0}% chance.

BattleEffectText.Name: Candy
BattleEffectText.Desc: Deals {0}% additional damage to targets that used <Candy>.

BattleEffectText.Name: Pebble
BattleEffectText.Desc: For {0} Scene(s), restore 10% of max HP at the start of the Scene. Take 20% of max HP as damage whenever an ally dies.

BattleEffectText.Name: Immobilized
BattleEffectText.Desc: Cannot act for the duration of the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Staggered
BattleEffectText.Desc: Cannot act for the duration of the Scene. Page restock and Light restoration will not take place.

BattleEffectText.Name: Burn
BattleEffectText.Desc: At the end of the Scene, take {0} damage and subtract 1/3rd of the Burn stack. (Rounds down)

BattleEffectText.Name: Paralyzed
BattleEffectText.Desc: For the duration of the Scene, whenever the character plays any Combat Page, up to {0} random dice on it have their maximum roll value reduced by 3.

BattleEffectText.Name: Bleeding
BattleEffectText.Desc: For the Scene, take {0} damage and subtract 1/3rd of the Bleed stack every time the character rolls an Offensive die. (Rounds up)

BattleEffectText.Name: Fragile
BattleEffectText.Desc: Take {0} additional damage from attacks this Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Feeble
BattleEffectText.Desc: Decrease the Power of Offensive dice by {0} for the duration of the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Disarmed
BattleEffectText.Desc: Decrease the Power of Defensive dice by {0} for the duration of the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Bound
BattleEffectText.Desc: Reduce all Speed values by {0} for the duration of the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Protected
BattleEffectText.Desc: Take {0} less damage from attacks this Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Strengthened
BattleEffectText.Desc: Increase the power of Offensive dice by {0} for the duration of the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Enduring
BattleEffectText.Desc: Increase the power of Defensive dice by {0} for the duration of the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Haste
BattleEffectText.Desc: Increase all Speed values by {0} for the duration of the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Blurred
BattleEffectText.Desc: This character cannot be targeted by the enemy as long as other targets without Blurred exist. Removed at the end of Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Burn X
BattleEffectText.Desc: At the end of the Scene, take X damage and subtract 1/3rd of the stack. (Rounds down)

BattleEffectText.Name: Paralysis X
BattleEffectText.Desc: For the Scene, up to X dice have their maximum roll value decreased by 3 when using pages.

BattleEffectText.Name: Bleed X
BattleEffectText.Desc: For the Scene, take X damage and subtract 1/3rd of the stack every time an Offensive die rolls. (Rounds up)

BattleEffectText.Name: Fragile X
BattleEffectText.Desc: Take X additional damage from attacks for the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Feeble X
BattleEffectText.Desc: Offensive dice lose X Power for the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Disarm X
BattleEffectText.Desc: Defensive dice lose X Power for the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Bound X
BattleEffectText.Desc: Lower all Speed values by X for the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Protection X
BattleEffectText.Desc: Take X less damage from attacks for the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Strength X
BattleEffectText.Desc: Offensive dice gain +X Power for the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Endurance X
BattleEffectText.Desc: Defensive dice gain +X Power for the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Haste X
BattleEffectText.Desc: Boost all Speed dice values by X for the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Combat Start
BattleEffectText.Desc: Activates when the combat phase of a Scene begins and before characters approach targets.

BattleEffectText.Name: Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be used with specific Key pages.

BattleEffectText.Name: Counter
BattleEffectText.Desc: Die is only played upon receiving a one-sided attack (Does not apply when both characters use a Combat Page and the opponent has more dice)

BattleEffectText.Name: Prepared Meat
BattleEffectText.Desc: At 1 HP, they will be consumed by the Fairy Queen.

BattleEffectText.Name: Cocoon
BattleEffectText.Desc: Targeted by the Spiderlings.

BattleEffectText.Name: Searing Sword
BattleEffectText.Desc: On a successful hit, inflict 4 Burn to target.

BattleEffectText.Name: Feather Shield
BattleEffectText.Desc: After taking a hit, inflict 2 Burn to attacker. Take -5 damage from attacks.

BattleEffectText.Name: Blazing Strike
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gain +2 Speed dice this Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Readying Blazing Strike
BattleEffectText.Desc: Will use Blazing Strike in {0} Scenes.

BattleEffectText.Name: Villain
BattleEffectText.Desc: Become the target of the Queen of Hatred.

BattleEffectText.Name: Hated
BattleEffectText.Desc: Become the target of *all* of the Queen of Hatred's pages.

BattleEffectText.Name: Tears
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gain a Speed die. Use special Combat Pages. Resistances change.

BattleEffectText.Name: Blessing
BattleEffectText.Desc: Resistances against the type of damage that dealt the most on the previous Scene are changed to "Endured" for this Scene. (Applies separately for physical and Stagger damage)

BattleEffectText.Name: Pale Hands
BattleEffectText.Desc: Will take 3-10 bonus Stagger damage on every third hit from the librarian with the Abnormality page 'Pale Hands'.

BattleEffectText.Name: Persistent
BattleEffectText.Desc: Upon taking lethal damage, 80% chance to revive with some HP. This chance is halved each time the character revives.

BattleEffectText.Name: Slash Power-Up
BattleEffectText.Desc: Slash dice gain +{0} Power for this Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Pierce Power-Up
BattleEffectText.Desc: Pierce dice gain +{0} Power for this Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Blunt Power-Up
BattleEffectText.Desc: Blunt dice gain +{0} Power for this Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Spores
BattleEffectText.Desc: At the start of the Scene, take {0} damage and halve the stack. (Rounds down) Take {0} damage every time the character rolls an Offensive die. If the character dies with this ailment, a Worker Bee is spawned next Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Retribution
BattleEffectText.Desc: Take +2-4 damage from librarians without the Abnormality page 'Worker Bee'.

BattleEffectText.Name: Vines
BattleEffectText.Desc: When a librarian with the Abnormality page 'Vines' attacks this character, their Pierce dice gain +1-2 Power.

BattleEffectText.Name: Blazing
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gain a Speed die; Dice Power +2; lose 5% of Max HP every time the character rolls a die.

BattleEffectText.Name: Affection
BattleEffectText.Desc: All dice of an opponent attacking this character gain Power equal to the stacks of this effect.

BattleEffectText.Name: Fresh Meat
BattleEffectText.Desc: 'Wingbeat' gains +2 Power against this character and recovers 10 HP on hit.

BattleEffectText.Name: Mass Attack
BattleEffectText.Desc: Targets every enemy. A successful hit destroys the target's Combat Page or action dice.

BattleEffectText.Name: Summation
BattleEffectText.Desc: If the attack is > than the sum of dice rolls on target's Combat Page, they take damage, and their page is destroyed.

BattleEffectText.Name: Individual
BattleEffectText.Desc: If the dice roll is larger than the target's current die, they take damage, and the die is destroyed.

BattleEffectText.Name: Ravenousness
BattleEffectText.Desc: Current damage total: {0}.

BattleEffectText.Name: Singleton
BattleEffectText.Desc: A character is 'Singleton' if their Combat Bookshelf does not have any duplicate pages.

BattleEffectText.Name: Rage
BattleEffectText.Desc: Lasts 2 Scenes. Gain +2 Strength each Scene, and use Mass Attack pages.

BattleEffectText.Name: Astray Rage
BattleEffectText.Desc: Permanently persists. Gain +5 Strength and Haste each Scene, and use Mass Attack pages.

BattleEffectText.Name: Prey
BattleEffectText.Desc: Take +2-6 damage from attacks done by the librarian with the Abnormality page 'Prey'.

BattleEffectText.Name: Charge
BattleEffectText.Desc: Affects the properties of certain Combat Pages. 10 Charges can be stored at once.

BattleEffectText.Name: Warm Heart
BattleEffectText.Desc: The max. roll value of all dice is raised by +{0}.

BattleEffectText.Name: A Token of Friendship
BattleEffectText.Desc: At the start of the Scene, restore 10% of Max HP.

BattleEffectText.Name: Smoke
BattleEffectText.Desc: Take {0}% more damage. Can stack up to 10. Dice Power +1 if the character has 9+ Smoke. Lose 1 Smoke at the end of the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Smoke
BattleEffectText.Desc: Deal {0}% more damage. Can stack up to 10. Dice Power +1 if the character has 9+ Smoke. Lose 1 Smoke at the end of the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Smoke
BattleEffectText.Desc: Amplifies damage taken. At 9+ Smoke, all dice gain +1 Power. Stacks up to 10. -1 Smoke at the end of each Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Sealed
BattleEffectText.Desc: {0} Speed dice become unusable. Leftmost dice is sealed first.

BattleEffectText.Name: Magic Bullet
BattleEffectText.Desc: Every 7th Melee or Ranged page targets random characters, including allies.

BattleEffectText.Name: Skulking in the Shadows
BattleEffectText.Desc: Librarians who are not targeted by the Wolf cannot act.

BattleEffectText.Name: Claws of Savagery
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gain +2 Strength for this Scene; cannot be targeted; cannot clash against enemies; inflict 1 Bleed next Scene for every successful hit.

BattleEffectText.Name: Manifested Mind
BattleEffectText.Desc: All resistances change to "Fatal".

BattleEffectText.Name: Cinder
BattleEffectText.Desc: Offensive dice gain “[On Hit] Inflict 1 Burn”.

BattleEffectText.Name: Ember
BattleEffectText.Desc: Max. roll value of the first die of pages with 'Matchlight' increases by 1 for each stack. The die inflicts Burn equal to the stacks of Ember on hit. If there are 4 or more stacks of Ember, explode after rolling the first die with a 25% chance, inflicting damage equal to the max. roll value to self.

BattleEffectText.Name: Rhythm
BattleEffectText.Desc: While this effect is active, gain 1 Strength at the start of the Scene, and take +2-5 Stagger damage from attacks. Lose 1 Rhythm at the end of the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Thrill
BattleEffectText.Desc: If upon taking a hit Thrill reaches 3 stacks, take 2-7 damage and Stagger damage, and lose this status.

BattleEffectText.Name: Yujin’s Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of Yujin’s Key page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Sweepers’ Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the decks of Sweepers’ Key pages.

BattleEffectText.Name: Rose, Lesti, and Sen’s Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the decks of Rose, Lesti, and Sen’s Key pages.

BattleEffectText.Name: Unstable Crying Children’s Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of Unstable Page of the Crying Children.

BattleEffectText.Name: Lowell’s Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of Lowell’s Key page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Cecil and Mei’s Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the decks of Cecil and Mei’s Key pages.

BattleEffectText.Name: Profound Wound
BattleEffectText.Desc: If upon taking a hit Profound Wound reaches 5 stacks, take damage equal to 25% of Max HP.

BattleEffectText.Name: Laetitia’s Gift
BattleEffectText.Desc: Explodes in {0} Scene(s)

BattleEffectText.Name: Pit-a-pat
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gain a stack every time a 'Gift' page explodes. At 3 stacks, the character is killed, and a Wee Witch’s Friend is spawned next Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Giftee
BattleEffectText.Desc: If the character clashes against an opponent other than the one that gave the Gift, take 2-7 damage at the start of the clash and 2 Bleed next Scene at a 40% chance.

BattleEffectText.Name: Nettle Clothing
BattleEffectText.Desc: At the start of the Scene, gain Protection equal to the amount of this status effect. A stack is lost upon taking a hit.

BattleEffectText.Name: Disappeared Family
BattleEffectText.Desc: If the amount of this status is 4 or higher at the start of the Scene, use a special Combat Page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Small Gift
BattleEffectText.Desc: A weak 1-Cost Combat Page. Enemies prioritize using it over other pages. Exhausts on use.

BattleEffectText.Name: The Thumb’s Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the decks of Thumb Members. (Soldato, Kalo, Katriel, and Denis’s Key pages)

BattleEffectText.Name: Kalo, Katriel, and Denis’s Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the decks of Kalo, Katriel, and Denis’s Key pages.

BattleEffectText.Name: Boris’ Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of Boris’ Key page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Ammunition
BattleEffectText.Desc: When used or discarded, gives bonus effects to Ranged Combat Pages.

BattleEffectText.Name: Damage Up
BattleEffectText.Desc: All Offensive dice the character plays deal +{0} damage for the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Penetrated Boundary
BattleEffectText.Desc: Max Stagger Resist decreased by {0}%.

BattleEffectText.Name: Uncontainable Knowledge
BattleEffectText.Desc: Max Stagger Resist decreased by 50% because of 'Enlightenment' in hand.

BattleEffectText.Name: Laurel Wreath of Atonement
BattleEffectText.Desc: Only this character can damage Alriune (and someone wielding its power).

BattleEffectText.Name: Aroma
BattleEffectText.Desc: At the start of the Scene, take {0} Stagger damage and halve the stack. (Rounds down)

BattleEffectText.Name: Stagger Resistance Down
BattleEffectText.Desc: All Stagger damage resistances change to "Fatal" for this Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Fervent Adoration
BattleEffectText.Desc: Uncontrollable. Upon becoming Staggered, this status is removed, and the character recovers from Stagger next Scene. Only takes Stagger damage from sane librarians; only takes physical damage from other librarians with this status. Takes no damage from the Abnormality's attacks (Excluding the Finale)

BattleEffectText.Name: Pianissimo
BattleEffectText.Desc: Angela gains +2 Power in a clash against this character.

BattleEffectText.Name: Power Up
BattleEffectText.Desc: Dice Power +{0}

BattleEffectText.Name: Fixed Speed: 1
BattleEffectText.Desc: Speed is fixed at 1 for this Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Petal
BattleEffectText.Desc: If the character takes 4 hits from the librarian with the Abnormality page 'Spring’s Genesis', all characters take 3-7 Stagger damage, and the character becomes untargetable next Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Untargetable
BattleEffectText.Desc: This character cannot be targeted.

BattleEffectText.Name: Fervent Adoration
BattleEffectText.Desc: Targets random characters, including allies. Deals +2-4 damage with attacks.

BattleEffectText.Name: Stagger Vulnerable
BattleEffectText.Desc: Take +2 Stagger damage from attacks for this Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Nemo’s Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of Nemo’s Key page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Bada’s Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of Bada’s Key page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Martina's Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of Martina's Key page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Nullify Power
BattleEffectText.Desc: Unaffected by Power-related effects for this Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Petal
BattleEffectText.Desc: When three petals bloom, a Mass Attack page will be used that Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Enchanted
BattleEffectText.Desc: Uncontrollable. Speed is fixed at 1. Uses ‘Dazzled’, targeting Big Bird.

BattleEffectText.Name: Stared At
BattleEffectText.Desc: For {0} Scenes, can only target the character that inflicted this status.

BattleEffectText.Name: Asleep
BattleEffectText.Desc: Becomes Staggered for this Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: A Warm Heart
BattleEffectText.Desc: Boost Offensive dice Power by 1-2 if the character has 3 or more Light at the start of the combat phase.

BattleEffectText.Name: Chill
BattleEffectText.Desc: 1 Chill is lost at the start of each Scene. At the start of the Scene, if the character has 4 or more Chill, gain 2 Bind and Feeble. If the character has 6 or more Chill, become Immobilized, and remove all Chill from self at the start of the next Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Lean, Bloody Wings
BattleEffectText.Desc: When this character engages in combat, all characters except themself, the target, and the librarian with the Abnormality page ‘Lean, Bloody Wings’ take 1-10 damage.

BattleEffectText.Name: Ice Splinter
BattleEffectText.Desc: If the stack is 3 or higher at the end of the Scene, the character becomes Immobilized for the next Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Frozen
BattleEffectText.Desc: Cannot act for this Scene. If it's your enemy, they gain 6 Bind next Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Dormant
BattleEffectText.Desc: Will awaken in {0} Scene(s).If a Heaven's Thorn or the Burrowing Heaven is Staggered, this does not go down.

BattleEffectText.Name: Dormant
BattleEffectText.Desc: A Thorn will awaken or spawn in {0} Scene(s). If the Burrowing Heaven is Staggered, this does not go down.

BattleEffectText.Name: Stagger Resistance Down
BattleEffectText.Desc: All Stagger damage resistances change to "Fatal" for this Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Yellow Brick Road
BattleEffectText.Desc: Targeted by The Road Home and Scaredy Cat. Scaredy Cat gains +5 Power when attacking this character. If all attacks of 'Friends! Let’s Go Home~!' fail to hit the target with this status, The Road Home's last attack is canceled.

BattleEffectText.Name: Courage
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gains Strength equal to the amount of times The Road Home was attacked this Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Home that Cannot be Reached
BattleEffectText.Desc: The counter goes up whenever the page targeting the 'Home' is canceled. If this reaches 3, a powerful Combat Page is used the following Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Stepping Stone
BattleEffectText.Desc: The librarian with the Abnormality page deals 3 more damage whenever they attack a target in the right order.

BattleEffectText.Name: A Road Walked Together
BattleEffectText.Desc: If an ally intercepts an attack that initially targeted this character, their page gains 1-2 Power

BattleEffectText.Name: Division
BattleEffectText.Desc: The total amount of HP recovered this Act.

BattleEffectText.Name: Blade Unlocked
BattleEffectText.Desc: Dice Power +1

BattleEffectText.Name: Unlocking
BattleEffectText.Desc: Number of unique Combat Pages used this Act: {0}

BattleEffectText.Name: Mass Attack Timer
BattleEffectText.Desc: Uses a Mass Attack every 4 Scenes; if no other Proxies are present, uses it every 2 Scenes. (Will be used in {0} Scenes)

BattleEffectText.Name: Unlock-Ⅱ
BattleEffectText.Desc: Combat Page with Slash (2-6), Pierce (1-3) dice; ‘[On Use] Exhaust this page and add 'Unlock-Ⅲ' to hand’

BattleEffectText.Name: Unlock-Ⅲ
BattleEffectText.Desc: Combat Page with Slash (3-7), Pierce (2-4) dice; ‘[On Use] Restore 1 Light and draw 1 page’

BattleEffectText.Name: Esther’s Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of Esther’s Key page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Hubert’s Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of Hubert’s Key page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Gloria’s Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of Gloria’s Key page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Erosion
BattleEffectText.Desc: At the end of the Scene, take {0} damage and lose 1 stack of Erosion. When taking a hit, take bonus damage and Stagger damage equal to the amount of this status.

BattleEffectText.Name: Cane
BattleEffectText.Desc: When Combat Page 'You Shall Fall…!' is used against this character, all dice on that page gain Power proportional to the amount of this status.

BattleEffectText.Name: Villain
BattleEffectText.Desc: While the character has this effect, gain 3 Fragile at the start of the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Void
BattleEffectText.Desc: While the character has this effect, gain 7 Feeble, Disarm, and Fragile at the start of the Scene

BattleEffectText.Name: Wrath
BattleEffectText.Desc: Uncontrollable; targets random characters including allies. At the start of the Scene, gain 2 Strength, restore 2 Light, and draw 2 more pages. (The drawback is nullified if the conditions for a certain Abnormality page are fulfilled.)

BattleEffectText.Name: Companion
BattleEffectText.Desc: If a librarian with the corresponding Abnormality page defeats this character, all librarians restore 3 Light and recover 10 HP and Stagger Resist, and a new 'Companion' can be set.

BattleEffectText.Name: Magical Girls
BattleEffectText.Desc: While all four Magical Girl pages are in hand, the librarian gains 1-2 Strength each Scene, and is not affected by Feeble, Disarm, or Bind.

BattleEffectText.Name: Nihil
BattleEffectText.Desc: Inflict 5 Feeble, Disarm, and Bind on all other characters at the start of the Scene. The downsides of Abnormality pages 'Greed', 'Hate', and 'Wrath' are nullified in the following ways: Greed: Only the librarian can activate the effect. Hate: No longer take bonus Stagger damage upon losing a clash. Wrath: Regain control of the librarian.

BattleEffectText.Name: Chun’s Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of Chun’s Key page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Furious Fire Rending the Skies
BattleEffectText.Desc: While this page is being used, inflict twice as much Burn using Combat Pages.

BattleEffectText.Name: Force of a Wildfire
BattleEffectText.Desc: If this character becomes Staggered within the next {0} Scenes, all of their allies are inflicted with Burn equal to half of the amount of Burn this character had at the start of the next Scene. (Rounds down)

BattleEffectText.Name: Silence
BattleEffectText.Desc: The time constraint for the setup phase does not apply for this Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Cumulating Time
BattleEffectText.Desc: The number of Remnants of Time defeated so far.

BattleEffectText.Name: Unstoppable Time
BattleEffectText.Desc: The special pattern will occur in {0} Scenes.

BattleEffectText.Name: Flown Time
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gains +3 Power in a *clash*.

BattleEffectText.Name: Flown Time
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gains +3 Power in a *one-sided attack*.

BattleEffectText.Name: Punisher
BattleEffectText.Desc: The first die of the first Combat Page played this Scene will gain +2-4 Power.

BattleEffectText.Name: Punishing Beak
BattleEffectText.Desc: Damage +{0}

BattleEffectText.Name: The Thirteenth Toll
Red Mist
BattleEffectText.Desc: Dice Power +{0}. Can stack up to 5.

BattleEffectText.Name: The Red Mist’s Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of The Red Mist’s Key page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Fairy
BattleEffectText.Desc: Take {0} damage every time the character rolls a die. At the end of the Scene, take {0} damage and halve the Fairy stack. (Rounds down)

BattleEffectText.Name: Manifesting E.G.O
BattleEffectText.Desc: Will manifest E.G.O in {0} Scene(s)

BattleEffectText.Name: E.G.O Manifested
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can use 'Great Split: Horizontal'. Dice Power +2. Take Stagger damage if the character fails to deal 40+ damage every Scene. This effect is disabled upon becoming Staggered.

BattleEffectText.Name: Fairy X
BattleEffectText.Desc: Take X damage every time a die rolls. At the end of the Scene, take X damage and halve the stack. (Rounds down)

BattleEffectText.Name: Sin
BattleEffectText.Desc: If the amount of Sin exceeds a certain threshold at the start of the Scene, Judgement Bird will use a special Combat Page. Sin can be transferred to allies by attacking and damaging them. (Once per page)

BattleEffectText.Name: Sin
BattleEffectText.Desc: If the amount of Sin reaches 5 or greater, take damage equal to 10% of Max. HP, and remove all stacks. Sin can be transferred to another character by attacking and damaging them. (Once per page)

BattleEffectText.Name: The Rhino Team’s Exclusive page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the decks of the Rhino and Maxim’s Key pages.

BattleEffectText.Name: The Reindeer Team’s Exclusive page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the decks of the Reindeer and Rudolph’s Key pages.

BattleEffectText.Name: Myo’s Exclusive page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of Myo’s Key page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Maxim’s Exclusive page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of Maxim’s Key page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Rudolph’s Exclusive page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of Rudolph’s Key page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Nikolai’s Exclusive page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of Nikolai’s Key page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Charge+
BattleEffectText.Desc: Affects the properties of certain Combat Pages. 20 Charges can be stored at once.

BattleEffectText.Name: Mark
BattleEffectText.Desc: Take 50% more damage and Stagger damage from attacks.

BattleEffectText.Name: Savage Mode
BattleEffectText.Desc: Dice Power +1

BattleEffectText.Name: Rage
BattleEffectText.Desc: Lasts 2 Scenes. Gain 2 Strength each Scene, and use Mass Attack pages.

BattleEffectText.Name: Astray Rage
BattleEffectText.Desc: Permanently persists. Gain 4 Strength each Scene, and use Mass Attack pages.

BattleEffectText.Name: Mark of the Hunt
BattleEffectText.Desc: Take 50% more damage from the Mercenary's attacks.

BattleEffectText.Name: Scars
BattleEffectText.Desc: At the start of the Scene, gain Bleed equal to the amount of Scars. If the amount is 6 or higher at the start of the Scene, take damage equal to 20% of Max. HP and remove all stacks. When attacked by the Wolf, take bonus damage equal to the current amount of Scars. The Wolf's dice gain +2 Power against targets with 4 or more Scars.

BattleEffectText.Name: Shell
BattleEffectText.Desc: For the Scene, copy all resistances and Combat Pages of the character that was defeated on the previous Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Terror
BattleEffectText.Desc: If the character has 3 or more copies of 'Terror' in hand at the start of the Scene, take 10 damage and Stagger damage for every copy in hand, and become Immobilized for the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Imitation
BattleEffectText.Desc: Affects the properties of certain Combat Pages. Can stack up to 10. 1 Imitation is lost at the end of each Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Blood
BattleEffectText.Desc: Uses different Combat Pages depending on the amount of Blood. 1 Blood is lost whenever the character sustains damage greater than 5% of Max. HP.

BattleEffectText.Name: Fear of Water
BattleEffectText.Desc: Lasts for 2 Scenes. At the start of the Scene, lose 5% of Max. HP and gain 1 Strength, 1 Haste, and 5 Bleed. If the character is at 50% HP or lower, become uncontrollable and attack allies at a 25% chance.

BattleEffectText.Name: Synchronize
BattleEffectText.Desc: Replace Combat Pages with unique ones. Deck and hand return to normal once status is disabled. Cannot be used with other Synchronize E.G.O or E.G.O Manifestation.

BattleEffectText.Name: The Purple Tear’s Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of The Purple Tear’s Key page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Change Stance
BattleEffectText.Desc: Remove all pages from deck and hand, and replace the deck with one built for the new stance. Afterwards, draw until the number of pages in hand equals the amount prior to changing stance.

BattleEffectText.Name: Slashing Stance
BattleEffectText.Desc: Slash Dice Power +2. Deal 50% additional damage with attacks.

BattleEffectText.Name: Piercing Stance
BattleEffectText.Desc: Pierce Dice Power +2. When inflicting status ailments using Combat Pages, apply twice as many stacks.

BattleEffectText.Name: Blunting Stance
BattleEffectText.Desc: Blunt Dice Power +2. Deal 50% additional Stagger damage with attacks.

BattleEffectText.Name: Guarding Stance
BattleEffectText.Desc: Defensive Dice Power +2. Remove all status ailments.

BattleEffectText.Name: Defense Power-up
BattleEffectText.Desc: Defensive dice gain +{0} Power for this Scene

BattleEffectText.Name: Warm Heart
BattleEffectText.Desc: At the start of the Scene, restore Light by the amount of 'Warm Hearts'. (Has no base Light regen) 1 Warm Heart is lost at the end of each Scene. Can stack up to 3.

BattleEffectText.Name: Heart Fragments
BattleEffectText.Desc: Increases the Power of certain Combat Pages Roland plays.

BattleEffectText.Name: Pieces of Mind
BattleEffectText.Desc: If the amount of this status reaches 4, gain 1 Warm Heart next Scene, and remove 4 stacks of this. 1 Piece of Mind is lost at the end of each Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Home that Cannot Be Reached
BattleEffectText.Desc: The counter goes up whenever the page targeting the 'Home' is canceled. If this reaches 2, a powerful Combat Page is used the following Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Cowardice
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gains Feeble equal to the amount of times The Road Home was attacked this Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Oblivion
BattleEffectText.Desc: All Combat Pages change to unique ones. On hit, regain a random Combat Page from the original deck. Pages remaining: {0}

BattleEffectText.Name: Jack of the South
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gain 2 Strength each Scene

BattleEffectText.Name: Jack of the West
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gain 2 Endurance each Scene

BattleEffectText.Name: Jack of the North
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gain 2 Haste each Scene

BattleEffectText.Name: Jack of the East
BattleEffectText.Desc: Deals +3 Stagger damage with attacks

BattleEffectText.Name: Lost Memories
BattleEffectText.Desc: All Combat Pages change to unique ones. All stats change. Other passive abilities of this character will not activate.

BattleEffectText.Name: Perfect Jack
BattleEffectText.Desc: Uses the Key page and Combat Pages of the librarian that turned into a pumpkin. Gains 2 Strength, 2 Endurance, 2 Haste, and a buff that increases Stagger damage by 3 every Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Warm-hearted Woodsman
BattleEffectText.Desc: After dealing 30 or more damage to enemies in a single Scene during this character's phase, fully restore Light of all allies including self.

BattleEffectText.Name: Scarecrow Searching for Wisdom
BattleEffectText.Desc: When this character's phase starts, add a copy of 'Wisdom' and 4 special Combat Pages to hand, and increase the number of Speed dice to 5. If failed to restore all librarians to their original forms by the end of the phase, reduce the number of Speed dice to 1.

BattleEffectText.Name: Scaredy Cat
BattleEffectText.Desc: When this character's phase starts, a copy of 'Courage' is added to hand. The number of Speed dice is increased to 5.

BattleEffectText.Name: The Road Home
BattleEffectText.Desc: Add 4 special Combat Pages to hand.

BattleEffectText.Name: Ozma
BattleEffectText.Desc: Add a copy of 'Pumpkify' and 3 special Combat Pages to hand. The Cost of 'Pumpkify' is reduced to 0 when this character's phase starts, and one Speed die becomes the fastest.

BattleEffectText.Name: Silk Sack of Sawdust
BattleEffectText.Desc: The number of Speed dice is reduced to 1.

BattleEffectText.Name: Warm-hearted Woodsman
BattleEffectText.Desc: Must be restored to their original form.

BattleEffectText.Name: Scaredy Cat
BattleEffectText.Desc: Must be restored to their original form.

BattleEffectText.Name: The Road Home
BattleEffectText.Desc: Must be restored to their original form.

BattleEffectText.Name: Ozma
BattleEffectText.Desc: Must be restored to their original form.

BattleEffectText.Name: Heart of Lead
BattleEffectText.Desc: Start with less Light, and the maximum Light capacity is reduced.

BattleEffectText.Name: Silk Sack of Sawdust
BattleEffectText.Desc: The number of Speed dice is reduced to 1 until the end of the battle.

BattleEffectText.Name: Courage
BattleEffectText.Desc: Purge all Feeble, Disarm, and Fragile from self. Gain 10 Strength and 5 Haste.

BattleEffectText.Name: Cowardice
BattleEffectText.Desc: 5 Feeble, Disarm, and Fragile is applied to self every Scene until the end of the battle.

BattleEffectText.Name: Helping Jack
BattleEffectText.Desc: Offensive dice gain +2 Power for this Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Powder of Life
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can revive from the effect of the Abnormality page 'Powder of Life'

BattleEffectText.Name: Liquid Courage
BattleEffectText.Desc: Deal +6 damage with attacks; take +3 damage from attacks

BattleEffectText.Name: Silk Sack of Sawdust
BattleEffectText.Desc: On clash win, recover 8 Stagger Resist; on clash lose, take 4 Stagger damage

BattleEffectText.Name: Heart of Lead
BattleEffectText.Desc: Every Scene, lose 5 HP and restore 1 additional Light

BattleEffectText.Name: Home that Cannot Be Reached
BattleEffectText.Desc: On clash lose, deal 4 Stagger damage to self and add +2 Power to the next die

BattleEffectText.Name: Transformation
BattleEffectText.Desc: Upon a successful attack in a clash, destroy the opponent's next die at a 50% chance; upon taking a hit in a clash, destroy the next die of self at a 50% chance.

BattleEffectText.Name: Emerald
BattleEffectText.Desc: Any character that hits this restores 1 Light for this Scene. (Up to 2 per character)

BattleEffectText.Name: Xiao’s Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of Xiao’s Key page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Chun and Miris’ Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the decks of Chun and Miris’ Key pages.

BattleEffectText.Name: Stagger Protection X
BattleEffectText.Desc: Take X less Stagger damage from attacks for the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Stagger Protection
BattleEffectText.Desc: Take {0} less Stagger damage from attacks this Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Pú Láo
BattleEffectText.Desc: The effect of Pú Láo will activate in {0} Scene(s), nullifying changes to dice Power

BattleEffectText.Name: Burn Damage Shield
BattleEffectText.Desc: Take 10 less damage from Burn for the Scene

BattleEffectText.Name: Mark of Sin
BattleEffectText.Desc: If the amount of 'Marks of Sin' exceeds a certain threshold at the start of the Scene, Roland will use a special Combat Page. A Mark of Sin can be transferred to another character (excluding Roland) by attacking and damaging them. (Once per page)

BattleEffectText.Name: Punishee
BattleEffectText.Desc: Take +8 damage from Roland's attacks.

BattleEffectText.Name: Vigilance
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gains Strength equal to the amount of times allies with lower Speed were attacked this Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Enchanted
BattleEffectText.Desc: Lasts {0} Scene(s). Uncontrollable. Speed is fixed at 1. Uses a special Combat Page, targeting Roland. Takes no physical damage when hit by allies. Removed when the character is Staggered.

BattleEffectText.Name: Darkness
BattleEffectText.Desc: Unaffected by Power-related effects for {0} Scenes

BattleEffectText.Name: Darkness
BattleEffectText.Desc: A status that lasts for 2 Scenes, nullifying Power-related effects.

BattleEffectText.Name: Heavy Guilt
BattleEffectText.Desc: Take {0} additional Stagger damage when hit. If the amount is 5 or greater at the end of the Scene, take 10% of Max. HP as damage and remove all stacks.

BattleEffectText.Name: Horrified
BattleEffectText.Desc: All resistances change to "Fatal". At the start of the Scene, gain 4 Paralysis.

BattleEffectText.Name: Apocalypse Bird’s Egg - Big Eyes
BattleEffectText.Desc: Unaffected by Power-related effects.

BattleEffectText.Name: Apocalypse Bird’s Egg - Long Arms
BattleEffectText.Desc: Is immune to status ailments while this effect is active. At the start of the Scene, purge all status ailments.

BattleEffectText.Name: Apocalypse Bird’s Egg - Small Beak
BattleEffectText.Desc: The cost of 2 random pages in the librarian's hand rise by 1 for the Scene

BattleEffectText.Name: The Beast
BattleEffectText.Desc: The dice of characters targeted by/attacking this character are unaffected by Power gain or loss. Said dice have their min and max values lowered by 3.

BattleEffectText.Name: Intruder
BattleEffectText.Desc: Lasts {0} Scene(s). All attacks done by this character deal 2-4 less physical and Stagger damage. Take 1-2 bonus damage when hit.

BattleEffectText.Name: 얀샋ㄷ요무’s Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of 얀샋ㄷ요무’s Key page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Distorted Blade
BattleEffectText.Desc: Will use Distorted Blade in {0} Scenes.

BattleEffectText.Name: True Salvation
BattleEffectText.Desc: If the Patron Librarian dies, all librarians die with him.

BattleEffectText.Name: Blessing
BattleEffectText.Desc: I shall heal you, curing you of all disease and injury you possess.

BattleEffectText.Name: Reverence
BattleEffectText.Desc: At the end of the Scene, take {0} Stagger damage, and lose 1 stack of this status.

BattleEffectText.Name: Revelation
BattleEffectText.Desc: Offensive dice of Apostles gain +2 Power when engaging a character with this status.

BattleEffectText.Name: Calling
BattleEffectText.Desc: This character will die at the end of the Scene; a Guardian Apostle will be spawned when this happens.

BattleEffectText.Name: Suspended
BattleEffectText.Desc: If HP drops to 2 or lower, will be Staggered until resurrected.

BattleEffectText.Name: Crown of Thorns
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gain a permanent 100 Protection and 100 Stagger Protection for this battle.

BattleEffectText.Name: Unguarded
BattleEffectText.Desc: All resistances change to "Fatal".

BattleEffectText.Name: Blessed
BattleEffectText.Desc: Has been Baptized this Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Baptist
BattleEffectText.Desc: Used 'Baptism' {0} time(s) this reception. (Counts up to 12 times)

BattleEffectText.Name: Martyr
BattleEffectText.Desc: On a successful attack this Scene, deal 4-6 bonus Stagger damage but take 1-3 damage.

BattleEffectText.Name: A Nostalgic Sound
BattleEffectText.Desc: The effect of the Abnormality page 'A Nostalgic Sound' (denoted by the status effect 'I Can Hear the Sound of the Star!') will activate in {0} Scenes.

BattleEffectText.Name: I Can Hear the Sound of the Star!
BattleEffectText.Desc: Deal +2-4 Stagger damage with attacks this Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Mirinae, Harold, and Olivier’s Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the decks of Mirinae, Harold, and Olivier’s Key pages.

BattleEffectText.Name: Geon
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gain 1 Strength, and deal 2 more damage and Stagger damage with attacks this Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Gon
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gain 1 Endurance, and take 30% less damage and Stagger damage from attacks this Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Gam
BattleEffectText.Desc: Restore 1 Light.

BattleEffectText.Name: Ri
BattleEffectText.Desc: Draw 1 page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Bonus Effect
BattleEffectText.Desc: Geon - ‘On Use: All dice on this page gain +1 Power’

BattleEffectText.Name: Bonus Effect
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gon - ‘Combat Start: Gain 2 Protection and Stagger Protection’

BattleEffectText.Name: Bonus Effect
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gam - ‘On Use: Restore 1 Light’ Ri - ‘On Use: Draw 2 pages’

BattleEffectText.Name: Furioso
BattleEffectText.Desc: Number of The Black Silence’s Combat Pages used: {0}

BattleEffectText.Name: The Black Silence
BattleEffectText.Desc: When the amount of this status is 2, all dice on the next played Combat Page will gain +2 Power.

BattleEffectText.Name: Duel
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gain bonus Max HP and Max Stagger Resist.

BattleEffectText.Name: Information Assessment
BattleEffectText.Desc: {0} is changed to "Normal" for this Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Exposed Weakness
BattleEffectText.Desc: A "Weak" resistance is changed to "Fatal" for this Act.

BattleEffectText.Name: En Garde
BattleEffectText.Desc: A 2-Cost Combat Page with a Slash (6-10) die; 'Exhausts on use; [On Use] Give 1 Strength to target and self next Scene'

BattleEffectText.Name: To Claim Their Bones
BattleEffectText.Desc: A 5-Cost Combat Page with a Slash (14-23) Counter; 'Exhausts on use; [On Hit] Inflict 5 Paralysis and 3 Bleed; cannot hold 2 at once'

BattleEffectText.Name: Bamboo-hatted’s Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of Bamboo-hatted Kim’s Key page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Vibration
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can be stacked up to 7

BattleEffectText.Name: Argalia’s Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of Argalia’s Key page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Elena’s Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of Elena’s Key page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Pluto’s Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of Pluto’s Key page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Philip’s Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of Philip’s Key page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Tanya’s Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of Tanya’s Key page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Puppeteer’s Strings
BattleEffectText.Desc: At the start of the Scene, gain 1 Strength or Endurance. HP cannot go below 1. If HP reaches 1 or the ally with the passive ability 'Puppet Strings' is not present, this status is removed at the end of the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Suffocating Haze
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can stack up to 3. The character is inflicted with a random status ailment (Bleed, Paralysis, Feeble, Disarm, Bind, or Fragile) for each stack of Suffocating Haze at the start of the next Scene, losing all Suffocating Haze.

BattleEffectText.Name: Suffocating Haze
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can stack up to 3. The character is inflicted with a random status ailment (Bleed, Paralysis, Feeble, Disarm, Bind, or Fragile) for each stack of Suffocating Haze at the start of the next Scene, losing all Suffocating Haze.

BattleEffectText.Name: Suffocating Haze
BattleEffectText.Desc: Stacks up to 3. Character receives a random ailment (Bleed, Paralysis, Feeble, Disarm, Bind, or Fragile) for each stack of this effect at the start of next Scene. Loses all stacks.

BattleEffectText.Name: Soul Link
BattleEffectText.Desc: Stagger Resist does not go below 1.

BattleEffectText.Name: Dark Presence
BattleEffectText.Desc: Lasts 1 Scene. Dice Power +1 when engaging Angelica.

BattleEffectText.Name: Ashen Presence
BattleEffectText.Desc: Lasts 1 Scene. Dice Power +1 when engaging Roland.

BattleEffectText.Name: Dark Mark
BattleEffectText.Desc: Targeted by Roland. Roland's Offensive dice gain +3 Power against this character.

BattleEffectText.Name: Rampaging
BattleEffectText.Desc: At the start of the Scene, lose 50% of current Stagger Resist (Only once). Gain 2 Strength and Haste every Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Grief-stricken
BattleEffectText.Desc: Inflicted with 3 Bind, Paralysis, and Fragile every Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Lies
BattleEffectText.Desc: Randomize the Costs of all Combat Pages whose original Cost is 3 or less.

BattleEffectText.Name: Weapon Break
BattleEffectText.Desc: Ignores Roland's Scar effects. Offensive dice gain +1 Power against Roland.

BattleEffectText.Name: Scars - Bruises
BattleEffectText.Desc: Take 2-5 less damage from Blunt attacks. When hit by a Blunt attack, 25% chance to reduce incoming damage to 0.

BattleEffectText.Name: Scars - Punctures
BattleEffectText.Desc: Take 2-5 less damage from Pierce attacks. When hit by a Pierce attack, 25% chance to reduce incoming damage to 0.

BattleEffectText.Name: Scars - Cuts
BattleEffectText.Desc: Take 2-5 less damage from Slash attacks. When hit by a Slash attack, 25% chance to reduce incoming damage to 0.

BattleEffectText.Name: Blood
BattleEffectText.Desc: Defensive dice gain 1-2 Power this Scene. If a Defensive die loses in a clash, take 3-6 Stagger damage.

BattleEffectText.Name: Leer
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gain 1 Strength this Scene. If an Offensive die fails to deal damage, take 3-6 Stagger damage. Strength gain increases by 1 whenever this effect activates.

BattleEffectText.Name: Curiosity
BattleEffectText.Desc: For this Scene, on hit, shuffle two random pages in target's hand back into their deck.

BattleEffectText.Name: Kiss
BattleEffectText.Desc: Prioritizes targeting librarians with Bind. For this Scene, on clash win, inflict Ice Splinter to the opponent. At the end of the Scene, characters with 3 or more Ice Splinters become Immobilized for the next Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Ready to Act
BattleEffectText.Desc: For {0} Scenes, does not act, cannot be targeted, and cannot take damage from status ailments. When the character resumes action after {0} Scenes, all status ailments are purged.

BattleEffectText.Name: Restraint
BattleEffectText.Desc: This status is not lost at the end of the Scene. If Philip hits a character with 3 or more stacks of this status, they're Immobilized for the next Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Restraint
BattleEffectText.Desc: This status is not lost at the end of the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Restraint
BattleEffectText.Desc: This status is not lost at the end of the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Violent Sandstorm
BattleEffectText.Desc: For the duration of the Act, deal +3 damage with attacks.

BattleEffectText.Name: Unbound Flesh
BattleEffectText.Desc: For the duration of the Act, gain 1-3 Haste at the start of the Scene, and all dice gain +1 Power.

BattleEffectText.Name: Puppet Strings
BattleEffectText.Desc: {0} Speed dice with the lowest Speed become uncontrollable, targeting allies for attacks. (Can stack up to 3) Removed if Jae-heon dies.

BattleEffectText.Name: Red Strings
BattleEffectText.Desc: In {0} Scenes, if two or more characters have this status, they die, and Mx. Bunny is spawned. If a librarian has this status, they gain 10 Haste at the start of the Scene. Removed if Oswald or Jae-heon dies.

BattleEffectText.Name: Vulnerability
BattleEffectText.Desc: All resistances change to "Fatal" for this Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Weary
BattleEffectText.Desc: Roland's Combat Pages are weakened.

BattleEffectText.Name: Incapacitated
BattleEffectText.Desc: Cannot participate in battle this Act

BattleEffectText.Name: Nullifier
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can block an attack whose dice value is 30 or greater once

BattleEffectText.Name: Hankering
BattleEffectText.Desc: While this character is on the offensive, gain Strength equal to the amount of this status. The amount of Hankering is reset when this character is Staggered or when the Scene in which Aspiration goes on the offensive ends.

BattleEffectText.Name: Fervent Beats
BattleEffectText.Desc: The character dies in {0} Scenes. At the start of each Scene, gain 4 Strength, Endurance, Haste, and Protection. Stagger damage resistances change to "Ineffective". When Aspiration is not on the offensive, this character uses special Combat Pages. When this effect activates, the 'Craving' effect is removed. This effect is removed when Aspiration's offensive move is over.

BattleEffectText.Name: Craving - The Faith
BattleEffectText.Desc: At the start of the Scene, gain Strength and Endurance equal to half the amount of 'Hankering' Aspiration has (rounded up).

BattleEffectText.Name: Craving - The Pain
BattleEffectText.Desc: Whenever an ally is defeated, give 4 Hankering to Aspiration.

BattleEffectText.Name: Craving - The Effort
BattleEffectText.Desc: On hit, give 1 Hankering to Aspiration. If the character fails to deal any damage by the end of the Scene, Aspiration loses 2 Hankering.

BattleEffectText.Name: Craving - The Wait
BattleEffectText.Desc: At the end of the Scene, give 3 Hankering to Aspiration.

BattleEffectText.Name: Why is it Bad?
BattleEffectText.Desc: The lie has been busted. Inflicted with 4 Feeble and Disarm, and Stagger damage resistance are changed to "Fatal".

BattleEffectText.Name: Lalala~
BattleEffectText.Desc: The lie hasn't been caught. Gain 4 Strength and Endurance.

BattleEffectText.Name: A Song of Lies
BattleEffectText.Desc: At the start of the Scene, the Costs of all Combat Pages whose original Cost is 3 or less in all characters' hands are randomized.

BattleEffectText.Name: A Song of Curiosity
BattleEffectText.Desc: At the start of the Scene, all librarians shuffle all Combat Pages into the draw pile and then draw 3.

BattleEffectText.Name: Seed of Light
BattleEffectText.Desc: Emotion heightens twice as fast this Act.

BattleEffectText.Name: Nails
BattleEffectText.Desc: Take {0} additional damage from Hammer. Lose 1 Nail at the end of the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Anxiety
BattleEffectText.Desc: For this Scene, any dice played in engagements involving this character are unaffected by Power gain or loss. Deal +1~2 damage with attacks. If the character fails to deal any damage with Offensive dice this scene, take 15 Stagger damage.

BattleEffectText.Name: Fright
BattleEffectText.Desc: For this Scene, any dice played in engagements involving this character are unaffected by Power gain or loss. Deal +1~2 Stagger damage on a deflect. If the character fails to deal any deflect damage with Block dice this scene, take 15 Stagger damage.

BattleEffectText.Name: Self-reproach
BattleEffectText.Desc: For this Scene, any dice played in engagements involving this character are unaffected by Power gain or loss. Take 1~2 less Stagger damage from attacks. If the character does not receive any damage this Scene, take 15 Stagger damage.

BattleEffectText.Name: Faint Glimmer
BattleEffectText.Desc: If you don't use 9 unique E.G.O pages until the end of this phase……

BattleEffectText.Name: Target Affixed
BattleEffectText.Desc: This character's attacks cannot be redirected.

BattleEffectText.Name: A Warm Light
BattleEffectText.Desc: You feel the strength to take a step forward.

BattleEffectText.Name: The Final Fragment of Light
BattleEffectText.Desc: A new E.G.O page can be used!

BattleEffectText.Name: Fragments of Light
BattleEffectText.Desc: Number of unique E.G.O pages used: {0}

BattleEffectText.Name: Cost Down
BattleEffectText.Desc: Cost -{0}, Page Dice Power -{0}. Resets when discarded or used.

BattleEffectText.Name: Cost Up
BattleEffectText.Desc: Cost +{0}, Page Dice Power +{0}. Resets when discarded or used.

BattleEffectText.Name: Conviction
BattleEffectText.Desc: Dice Power +10

BattleEffectText.Name: Impending Break
BattleEffectText.Desc: In {0} Scenes, uses a powerful Combat Page against characters with Guilt. The attack is delayed for a Scene if this character is Staggered.

BattleEffectText.Name: Nails
BattleEffectText.Desc: When hit by a Blunt attack, the character takes 5 damage for every stack of this status, which is then removed.

BattleEffectText.Name: Aspiration
BattleEffectText.Desc: Increase Max HP by 15%. (Current HP increases accordingly) Gain 1-2 Speed.

BattleEffectText.Name: Nostalgic Embrace of the Old Days
BattleEffectText.Desc: Upon winning a clash, deal bonus Stagger damage equal to the dice value at a 20% chance. Clashing against the same target multiple times will increase the likelihood.

BattleEffectText.Name: Pinpoint Breakthrough
BattleEffectText.Desc: A 2-Cost Combat Page with Blunt (5-10), Pierce (15-24) dice; ‘[On Use] Exhaust this page; cannot hold 2 at once'

BattleEffectText.Name: Single-use
BattleEffectText.Desc: Page is exhausted on use. Exhausted pages are removed from play until the end of the Act.

BattleEffectText.Name: Exhaust
BattleEffectText.Desc: Page will be removed from play for this Act.

BattleEffectText.Name: On Play
BattleEffectText.Desc: Page's effect immediately takes place when slotted on a Speed die.

BattleEffectText.Name: Requested Target
BattleEffectText.Desc: Take +3-5 damage from the character with the Abnormality page 'Request'.

BattleEffectText.Name: Meaningless Struggle
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gain 1 'Step Toward Futility' upon losing a clash using the page with this symbol.

BattleEffectText.Name: Steps Toward Futility
BattleEffectText.Desc: When this reaches 4, gain 'Pointless' next Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Pointless
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gain 5 Protection each Scene. Become immune to status ailments. When hit, the attacker is inflicted with 1 Erosion and Fragile next Scene. (Twice per Scene)

BattleEffectText.Name: Blood
BattleEffectText.Desc: 3 stacks of Blood are lost at the end of each Scene. At 0 Blood: Lose 4-8 Stagger Resist at the start of the Scene. At 1+ Blood: When rolling an Offensive die, lose 2-7 HP, and boost damage by 3-7. At 15+ Blood: Gain 2 Strength. The amount of Blood is reset at the start of the next Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Enchanted by Big Bird
BattleEffectText.Desc: Targets the character with the Abnormality page <'Big Eyes'>. Deals +2-4 damage with attacks.

BattleEffectText.Name: Dark Flame
BattleEffectText.Desc: The "Endured/Ineffective" resistances of the Key Page change to "Weak/Fatal".

BattleEffectText.Name: Bayard’s Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of Bayard’s Key page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Yae’s Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of Yae’s Key page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Allen’s Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of Allen’s Key page.

BattleEffectText.Name: The Udjat’s Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of an Udjat’s Key Page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Irina’s Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of Irina’s Key Page.
